We’ve both spent our careers at the intersection of finance and technology — and we’re using that experience to reimagine how markets are analyzed and traded.

Scalar Field is built around a simple idea: most people log into a terminal because, consciously or subconsciously, they’re trying to validate a hypothesis.

But today’s terminals don’t help with that. They’re dashboards — not thinking tools.

So we built Scalar Field to change that: a platform where users can test any market hypothesis instantly using intelligent agents.

You can spin up agents that react to market events, run backtests across data from multiple asset classes, and even trigger trades when specific conditions are met — all in one place.
one_liner: Reinventing the trading terminal — one intelligent agent at a time.

name: Zero
long_description: Zero empowers knowledge workers by transforming the way they manage their email. It intelligently summarizes important messages, helps complete tasks, and even enables users to chat directly with their inbox.
one_liner: AI powered email client that manages your email so you don't have to.

name: Synthetic Society
one_liner: Synthetic Users to Simulate Real Users

name: Mesmer
long_description: Mesmer is Cursor for CTOs. We give founders and CTOs full visibility into their org without drowning in meetings or chasing updates. We are a team of repeat founders and CTOs with 15+ years of experience each, including leading product development togehter at Origin Financial, a fintech started by Mesmer's CEO, as it scaled to 8-figure ARR, 100+ employees and a $400M valuation. Mesmer reached 6-figure ARR within a week of launching and is already live with companies worth over $8B, including Webflow and Origin Financial.
one_liner: Cursor for CTOs

name: Rimba
long_description:
Rimba is building an AI-powered platform to help industrial and energy companies stay compliant with environmental regulations.

Legacy systems can’t keep up with today’s complex compliance needs. Rimba offers a platform that integrates data from various software systems—like ERPs, SCADA, Sharepoint—to monitor, report, and verify emissions and other environmental data. Rimba has the capability to parse through PDFs and time-series data at scale while having an AI that continuously learns and predicts outcomes.
one_liner: AI to replace manual work in environmental compliance reporting

name: Moby Analytics
long_description: At Moby Analytics, we provide the first AI agentic platform built for financial auditors. Auditors easily create and deploy AI agents to automate audit workflows. No code, just prompts and domain expertise.
one_liner: AI financial auditors

name: Delty
one_liner: Transforming healthcare operations with AI agents

name: Lumari
long_description: Lumari enables supply chain teams to streamline operations with always-on agents that monitor, coordinate, and take action from sourcing to delivery.
one_liner: AI Digital Workers for Supply Chain

name: Code Four
long_description:
Code Four slashes the administrative burden on law enforcement through AI-driven automation. Officers spend up to a third of their shifts manually transcribing body camera footage, creating inaccuracies, reducing transparency, and cutting into frontline duties. We're here to eliminate these inefficiencies by integrating with body cameras, record management systems, and digital evidence management systems—acting as a software layer for data processing. 

We free the most overworked and underappreciated people in the world: police officers.
one_liner: Modernizing the police workflow.

name: Cactus
long_description: Cactus is the 24/7 AI call center built for home service businesses. Our AI answers calls, qualifies customers, books jobs, and follows up automatically, helping business owners capture more leads and retain more customers - all without hiring additional staff.
one_liner: 24/7 AI Call Center for Home Services

name: Wavedash
long_description: Wavedash uses cutting edge browser technology to let gamers play the latest releases with no downloads or installation.
one_liner: Play the latest games in your browser with no downloads

name: StarSling
long_description: StarSling is building an agentic developer homepage that automates all the tasks that eat up a developer’s time after they’ve left their code editor: deployments, performance, incidents, and bugs. Open your homepage, click on a GitHub, Linear, or Sentry issue and you’ll see an Autofix button that triggers an AI agent and opens up a Pull Request with a fix, all without leaving your homepage.
one_liner: Cursor for DevOps

name: Text.ai
long_description:
We're building the first group chat with social skills.

While everyone else is stuck with boring individual chatbots, we've cracked the impossible: Alfi reads the room, understands each person, and creates custom intelligence for every group chat.

Alfi is your new social friend. The one who remembers everything, plans effortlessly, and keeps the crew together.

Here's what that looks like:

- Book restaurants together, with Yelp built in, directly in the chat. No more "where should we go?" spirals. Reserve instantly.
- Create images with your friends: drop your crew into funny hats, wild scenes, anything you can dream up. Multiplayer image gen, first of its kind.
- Social calendar: upcoming hangs, all in one place. Everyone on the same page.
- Group Wrapped: who's the chattiest? Top inside jokes? Now you'll know.
- Reminders & Memory: Alfi remembers your spots, your preferences, and nudges you to actually hang out.

We're in the middle of a quiet shift. Gen Z is leaving broadcast social media. They're retreating to group chats, smaller, more intentional and personal spaces where they're honestly themselves.

But group chats are also where plans go to die. Someone has to be "the planner" or nothing happens.

We believe the group chat is the real social network. Where the funniest moments and real conversations happen in real time. With Alfi, we hope to bring you together more expressively, a lot more often.

This technology will bring humanity closer than it's ever been before. Not replace connection, deepen it. That's the future we're building toward.
one_liner: Alfi - your group chat with social skills to bring friends closer

name: Aegis
long_description: Aegis is the all-in-one platform that helps healthcare providers recover lost revenue by automating insurance denial appeals—from intake to resolution. Built for billing teams, healthcare providers and hospitals.
one_liner: AI Agents to win denied health insurance claims.

name: Docket
long_description: Docket lets you write end-to-end tests in plain English and keeps them up to date automatically—powered by real user sessions.
one_liner: AI agents for web testing

name: Autonomous Technologies Group
long_description:
Autonomous is a superintelligent financial advisor at 0% advisory fees. 

Today, managing your money means one of two bad options:

DIY your money: You end up with accounts everywhere (401k, IRAs, brokerage, crypto, savings, equity, secondaries). Your spreadsheet is always wrong. You make expensive mistakes because this isn't your full-time job.

Hire a financial advisor: They'll manage your money and charge 1-2% of assets annually. Run that math over multiple decades and you're handing over half your net worth to fees.

Neither path can economically deliver the sophisticated, personalized strategies the ultra-wealthy use to compound wealth: strategic tax-loss harvesting across individual securities, systematic risk management, portfolio-backed borrowing to defer capital gains, access to alternatives, etc.

These aren't secret – they're just economically impossible to deliver at scale through traditional human advisors.

Robos were supposed to fix this, but they were designed in a pre-AI world. In practice they just manage cookie-cutter portfolios. They don’t coordinate across your 401(k), taxable accounts, mortgage, equity, and cash flow, they don’t help with real decisions like job offers, windfalls, or concentrated stock, and they don’t deliver institutional strategies. That’s why, even after a decade plus, the biggest robos are still <$100B AUM while old-school advisors like Raymond James / Edward Jones sit on trillions.

We’re doing for financial advising what Robinhood did for brokerages. Think of it as a full-stack, AI-native wealth strategist that brings billionaire-style playbooks to ordinary investors.

Autonomous is built around a frontier-scale reasoning engine—an AI that perceives global events as they unfold, understanding their deeper implications for markets and and most importantly, how these events will impact your investments.
one_liner: Superintelligent financial advisor

name: Meteor
long_description:
Meet Meteor: a Chrome-alternative that can actually do your work for you.

With agents getting better by the day (literally), we realize that it’s time to automate the boring, tedious work.

We use your browser session to empower agents to act like your personal assistants (ex. book a calendar, find cheaper flights, buy clothes on amazon etc.)

Some of Meteor’s features:

- Chat with any page
- Integrate with popular apps like Gmail, Google Calendar, Twitter etc.
- Browser agent to autonomously navigate the web and perform tasks
- More coming soon!

We're excited to usher in a new era of browsing.
one_liner: An AI-Native Browser

name: Closera
one_liner: AI employees for commercial real estate

name: truthsystems
long_description:
Truth Systems provides a compliance agent to govern the use of generative AI. It translates operational policies into intelligent, real-time guardrails that monitor every AI interaction. This empowers companies to proactively block non-compliant actions and align access to AI tools with user competency. By eliminating the risks and operational blind spots associated with uncontrolled AI adoption, our platform enables enterprises to fully leverage the technology's potential without compromising security. 

We are establishing the new standard for AI governance, building a future where every professional can innovate safely and confidently.
one_liner: Automatically blocking risky behavior with real-time governance agents

name: Lanesurf
long_description:
Lanesurf helps freight brokers book shipments with vetted carriers at the best prices by negotiating rates across multiple calls in parallel.

Our self-improving voice AI stack is built for the messy reality of logistics - noisy calls, compliance checks, constant exceptions and turns them into faster bookings at better margins.

With each booking, the AI learns from aggregated, anonymized lane and pricing data. As more customers use Lanesurf, this learning compounds, driving faster bookings at the best prices and powering a voice-driven freight marketplace.
one_liner: Voice AI for booking freight

name: Shor
long_description:
Shor is a new Employer-of-Record built from the ground up with AI agents and stablecoins. We enable remote teams to hire and pay global employees at a fraction of the cost. The process is fast, simple, and fully compliant.

Today, global payroll is broken. Payments take days, cost 5–10% in fees, and force companies to navigate complex banking, tax, and labor regulations. Platforms like Deel and Rippling solved this for large enterprises but remain too expensive and cumbersome for the millions of startups and growing remote teams scaling globally.

Shor fixes this by combining autonomous AI agents with stablecoin-based settlement. Our agents handle contracts, worker classification, compliance, and payroll automatically in a simple, messaging-first experience. Payments can settle in seconds rather than weeks at a fraction of the cost of legacy providers.

We are making global payroll fast, affordable, and accessible for the millions of companies left out by legacy platforms.
one_liner: The fastest, most affordable payroll for global teams

name: Pond
long_description: We’re building an AI-native messaging app. Pond is a desktop app you can use with your existing messaging services like iMessage (and soon WhatsApp + more). You can see important messages you haven’t replied to, snooze conversations, answer customers in your voice, and more.
one_liner: Superhuman for text messages

name: Lark
long_description:
Lark is a modern billing platform with the flexibility to support any pricing model (flat-fee, credit-based, usage-based, hybrid, dimensional, outcome-based, etc.) at any scale. 
Whether you're building an AI powered API service or a B2B SaaS product, Lark provides the tools you need to implement complex billing logic without the hassle. Jack and Vijit previously built a usage-based billing system for a large billing provider.
one_liner: Billing for modern pricing models

name: Design Arena
one_liner: World's largest crowdsourced benchmark for AI-generated design

name: Lotas
long_description: For our first product, we built Rao: an AI coding assistant into RStudio — an IDE used by up to 5 million data scientists and statisticians who use the R programming language to analyze data. Rao could read, write, and edit code while understanding the user's context (codebase and environmental variables).
one_liner: AI for Data Science and 3D

name: Nuntius
long_description: Applying artificial intelligence to economically productive use-cases requires bulletproof alignment. We’re solving that.
one_liner: Making Models Follow Rules.

name: Panels
long_description: Panels is an audio data platform that delivers high-quality speech datasets from vetted, diverse contributors to power training and evaluation of foundational voice models.
one_liner: Audio Data for AI Labs

name: Cyberdesk
long_description:
Cyberdesk is the first self learning computer use agent for developers to automate desktop workflows. 

For example, one of our customers is building an AI agent for hospital patient intake, and they’re using us to automate an entire team of people manually clicking and typing into a desktop app to book appointments. 

We launched mid July, and our agent is already operating in production environments, creating appointments in electronic health record apps and processing files in legacy ERPs.

We’ve built the first computer use agent that memorizes tasks and repeats them quickly while still adapting to unexpected changes on the screen. A good analogy is to how humans use computers: once we get used to an app, we use it much faster, while still adapting to random popups and crashes. This new paradigm for computer use will be needed by every company automating human workflows on computers.

Mahmoud previously built robotic process automation solutions impacting 20K+ employees at a Fortune 100 company. He also built AI & ML solutions at Baylor College of Medicine Neuroscience & Texas Children's Hospital + co-published a paper at the Rice Networks Group. 

Alan is ex-NASA and previously dropped out to be the first founding engineer at a PearX startup. He is a second time founder, having previously built and scaled a consumer AI app to thousands of paying users.

Computer-use agents will automate the $6T dollars spent on enterprise knowledge work and Cyberdesk will be the platform to power this.

We’d love to talk with you!
https://cal.com/mahmoud-al-madi-klrs5s/30min
one_liner: Self learning computer use agent for developers

name: Janet AI
long_description:
Janet AI (janet.ai) is the first AI-native ticket management system, built for modern engineering teams and tool stacks. Janet doesn’t wait for your manual work.

- Ideas, bug reports, and feature requests get tracked directly from meetings/Slack/Discord/SMS.
- Tickets are auto-moved when GitHub PRs resolving them are opened and merged.
- You can reply to issue reporters in Slack/Discord directly from Janet when a ticket is resolved.
- Janet evaluates ticket quality, clusters related issues, and auto-tags issues.
- We bring all your tickets to your Cursor/Claude Code's context so coding agents can create, understand, update, prioritize, and resolve issues - the time spent on thorough ticketing finally has tangible ROI (not just a chore).
- And more!

Founders, product leaders, customer success, and engineers all love Janet: cross-team communication, collaboration, and execution are made seamless. That’s why users repeatedly switch away from Linear, Jira, and others after trying Janet for just a single project/sprint.

Check out janet.ai to get started today!
one_liner: The AI-Native Jira

name: Lilac
long_description: Lilac taps idle GPUs from cloud providers and enterprises, giving startups and researchers cheaper compute while letting companies monetize unused capacity. Fully automated with Kubernetes integration.
one_liner: Spot GPUs that use idle GPUs from enterprises

name: Alter
long_description:
Alter is a zero-trust identity and access control platform purpose-built for AI agents. It wraps every tool call in strong authentication, fine-grained authorization, and real-time guardrails, so agents can move fast without breaking things.

Each request is verified at the parameter level, authorized against granular policies, executed with least-privilege access, and fully audited in real time. Unsafe actions, whether it’s a rogue DROP TABLE or a payment above policy limits, are blocked before they touch production. Behind the scenes, Alter manages credentials, issuing ephemeral, scope-narrowed access for every interaction, then rotating or expiring it in seconds. The result: no long-lived secrets, no blind spots, and no surprises in audit.

With Alter, teams can move fast on AI agent initiatives while staying fully compliant with SOC 2, HIPAA, GDPR, and internal security standards. A CISO-ready dashboard delivers real-time visibility, detailed audit logs, and compliance-ready controls, removing silos, eliminating excessive permissions, and providing complete oversight of every agent workflow.
one_liner: Secure access control and authorization platform for agent workflows

name: Frizzle
long_description:
Frizzle uses AI to grade handwritten math assignments for teachers and transform them into rich analytics and differentiated assessment to help personalize instruction for every student. Teachers spend over 10 hours a week or 25% of all their work grading - Frizzle does it in minutes. Frizzle is the most valuable piece of software for teachers ever, as it eliminates the most time-consuming part of their workflow so they can focus on teaching.

Frizzle shifts education from waterfall to agile learning. Instead of waiting for end-of-unit tests to discover gaps, teachers get continuous, real-time insight into student thinking from everyday work. Feedback becomes immediate, instruction adapts weekly, and learning iterates (measure, adjust, improve) so every student progresses faster with less teacher burnout.

Frizzle was named an official White House AI Education Partner alongside OpenAI and Meta: https://www.whitehouse.gov/edai/.

Frizzle was co-founded by Abhay Gupta and Shyam Sai, who met in high school over 10 years ago.
one_liner: AI Grading for Teachers

name: Nori
long_description:
Nori is a concierge-level AI health coach in your pocket. 

It takes all of your health data—Apple Health, medical records, wearables, everything—and boils it down into a personalized daily plan.

Users love it: “It's truly one of the best apps and I check it first every day. Since using Nori, I've been limiting devices in bed and eating earlier—and I'll be damned if it's not working... I started getting more deep sleep, my resting HR dropped to 43, my recovery improved.”—Jen, Nori user"
one_liner: AI health coach in your pocket

name: Proliferate
long_description: Proliferate gives coding agents production-grade infrastructure- sandboxed environments, event triggers, and verification workflows- so they can ship code end-to-end, not just write it.
one_liner: The autonomous engineering organization

name: Sagekit
long_description: Sagekit is the AI workspace for research and writing. Work side by side with AI as ideas and research become real, lasting documents.
one_liner: AI workspace for research and writing

name: CareSwift
long_description: CareSwift is a real-time AI assistant built directly into ambulance reporting systems, guiding medics as they document care and instantly flagging errors. Crews complete accurate, compliant reports in under three minutes, cutting documentation time by 80 percent and helping agencies avoid insurance claim denials. Ambulance crews lose valuable time completing reports after each call. Even minor mistakes cause insurance claims to be rejected.
one_liner: AI scribe for Ambulance Reports

name: Wedge
long_description: The Operating System for Health AI: we deploy, govern, and scale AI agents across healthcare organizations.
one_liner: Palantir for Healthcare AI Agents

name: Slashy
long_description: AI that helps you fly through your inbox.
one_liner: Cursor for Email

name: cocreate
long_description: Before editing begins, professional video teams spend days copying, organizing, and prepping footage — a process that can eat up 40% of a project’s time and budget. CoCreate runs in the background during backup, delivering fully organized, searchable, and edit-ready projects for Premiere, Avid, Final Cut, or Resolve the moment media is offloaded. The result: faster turnarounds, fewer errors, and more time spent actually editing.
one_liner: AI-native video production software that automates post-production

name: Nexa Labs
long_description:
Nexa is developing the solution for cattle monitoring, leveraging implantable microchips that collect more comprehensive biometrics than anything else on the market. Our accompanying AI-driven animal health engine empowers farmers with early disease detection, reproductive insights, GPS tracking, and more. 

We're saving farmers time and money while collecting the world's largest cattle health dataset. We believe that cattle farming should be a science, not an art - this will secure the world's food supply and increase economic output that billions of people depend on.
one_liner: Implantable microchips and AI for cattle monitoring

name: Stellon Labs
long_description: Stellon Labs is an AI research lab that is building tiny frontier AI models that can run on edge devices like smartphones, wearables and embedded systems. Our first open source model, KittenTTS, is a super-tiny text-to-speech model, that got 8K Github stars and 45K model downloads within 2 weeks of launching.
one_liner: Building tiny frontier AI models that run on edge devices

name: Doe
long_description: Doe is where AI agents actually do your work. Connect your tools, tell Doe what you need, and agents handle it. When you want to do something yourself, Doe makes you faster and smarter. The boring stuff disappears. Everything else gets better.
one_liner: The boring stuff, handled. Everything else, supercharged.

name: Trace
long_description:
Trace is a workflow automation platform that routes tasks to the right agent – human or AI. We enable enterprise-grade context and AI orchestration in mid-sized teams. 

Trace breaks workflows into clear steps, sends repetitive tasks to AI agents, and routes the rest to the right people while respecting permissions and logging every action. 

We help teams cut busywork and unify AI tools across departments – helping companies adopt AI in days rather than months.
one_liner: Workflow automation that routes tasks to humans and AI

name: Embedder
long_description: Embedder is a coding agent that can write, test, and debug firmware.
one_liner: Cursor for Firmware

name: Channel3
long_description:
Channel3 is building a database of every product on the internet.

Google and OpenAI maintain vast product graphs, but keep that valuable data to themselves. Channel3 gives every developer access, opening a world of possibility for new shopping experiences across any vertical. For instance, developers could build AI fashion stylists or give their agents shopping capabilities.

We don’t just collect product data; we actually understand it. With the latest image classification and reasoning models, we can match products across merchants—even when listings and images differ—recognize variants, and surface the perfect matches for every search. As we grow, we’ll capture unique insights into what users want, click, and buy.

As AI models get smarter and cheaper, our flywheel accelerates: our catalog will improve, and it will be even easier for developers and vibe-coders to build on our infrastructure. To further incentivize building on Channel3, we provide built-in monetization; developers earn commissions on sales they drive.

Alex discovered this need while building an AI tutor that could recommend products and earn affiliate revenue. When no solution existed, he persuaded his smartest friend from Duke and former co-founder George to leave Palantir and build Channel3 together.
one_liner: Database of every product on the internet

name: Normal
long_description: Developing infrastructure to make robots useful in the real world
one_liner: Deploying and integrating useful robots

name: VibeFlow
long_description: VibeFlow generates full-stack web apps from prompts with n8n-style visual workflows for the backend. Users of tools like Lovable or v0 can easily iterate over frontends because they can see them, while backends remain closed black boxes that are hard to evolve through prompting. VibeFlow opens up backend logic, making it visual and editable, with powerful integrations built in.
one_liner: Lovable, n8n and a database all in one platform

name: Mimos
long_description:
Mimos helps companies rank in AI search.

800 million people use ChatGPT every week. Today, customers don’t see 10 blue links, they see an answer. And if your brand isn’t cited, you basically don’t exist. 

Our agents automate the playbook for becoming the answer:
 1. Pinpoint Visibility Gaps: Analyzes your site, competitors, and customer data to find precise ranking opportunities.
 2. Craft the Solution: Automatically stages technical fixes and generates policy-aligned content in your brand's voice. 
 3. Integrate with CMS: Instantly deploy fixes and content to your site, driving new leads in days, not months.

Learn more at trymimos.com

===

Rohit & Michael have been working together on various technical project since 6th grade (14 years!) - and Mimos came about as one of those projects.
one_liner: Helping companies rank in AI search

name: GoRiff
long_description:
Riff is a music editor with superpowers — helping artists work faster and making it easier than ever for hobbyists to break into music.

As we continue to build, we see Riff turning into an entirely new paradigm for creating music.
one_liner: Cursor for music production

name: Phases
long_description: Phases uses AI to automate clinical trial operations, starting with patient recruitment. Our agent scans medical records and conducts human-like voice interviews to assess patient eligibility for clinical trials. Our vision is to run the entire clinical trial back-office with agents, getting drugs to market at a fraction of the time and cost it takes today.
one_liner: Automating clinical trials, starting with patient recruitment.

name: mcp-use
long_description:
mcp-use provides open-source dev tools and infrastructure for MCP to help dev teams quickly build and deploy MCP Servers for AI agents & MCP Apps for ChatGPT.
Our library has over 4M downloads and 8,000 stars, and is used by hundreds of engineers at big enterprises.
We provide a hosted and self-hosted platform that manages auth, access control, and multi-user environments for secure MCP agents deployment at scale.
one_liner: Open-source dev tools and infrastructure for MCP.

name: Relling
one_liner: RL and Data Infrastructure for Robotic World Models

name: Motives
long_description: Motives is a team of AI agents that runs qualitative research projects for consumer brands: moderating and analyzing video interviews to help brands understand consumer preferences and test new ideas, in hours instead of weeks.
one_liner: Consumer focus groups run by AI

name: Finto
long_description: Finto builds AI accounting software for enterprise finance teams. We automate the invoice-to-pay process from their email inbox to their ERP. Cutting out 80% of the accountants daily work in invoice recording, account coding and  invoice approvals.
one_liner: AI accounting for enterprise finance teams

name: Knowlify
long_description:
Everyone loves the way 3Blue1Brown explains complex ideas. Now imagine having that same level of clarity for any topic, tailored to each learner’s needs.

That’s what we’re building at Knowlify.

Current use cases:
- Researchers turn dense papers into clear, digestible explanations
- Textbook publishers help students grasp challenging concepts
- Universities produce high-quality content while cutting costs by 90%
- Corporations keep teams sharp and up to date on the latest technologies

With Knowlify, the possibilities for learning are limitless.
one_liner: Convert textual content into explainer videos in < 15s

name: Alara
long_description: Alara aggregates product listings from numerous suppliers, shows real-time price comparisons, and lets dentists order from different vendors in a single cart. With Alara, dental offices are saving time and money when ordering supplies.
one_liner: Procurement Platform for Dental Offices

name: Floot
long_description:
Floot lets non-coders & entrepreneurs build real web apps that actually work. We’re taking a new approach by building everything from the ground up for AI.

✨ Try building an app at floot.com

Existing AI app builders fall short of enabling non-coders to build real, serious apps. They often:
- Break down when building anything more than a prototype or toy app
- Have non-coders stuck with errors they don’t understand
- Require non-coders to handle multiple services designed for developers (e.g. for backend, database, hosting, etc)

The fundamental problem: these AI app builders just cobble together existing developer tools and slap AI on top, but these tools were designed for humans and not for AI.

The result? Non-coders get excited, start building, hit a wall, and then abandon their projects.

Floot is purpose-built for AI. Our secret sauce:

1) Instead of reusing a coding framework designed for humans, we created a specialized framework that dictates how AI should write code and how the code runs on our infrastructure. This allows us to enforce best practices, detect errors earlier, and give the best feedback to the AI. As a result, Floot can write better code and fix issues more effectively.

2) Floot has the entire tech stack built-in (backend, database, hosting, etc) so building and managing an app feels seamless, especially for non-coders. And because we control every layer of the stack, we can optimize each layer for AI-first coding.

Because of this, non-coders can get more done with less time and prompting. They can finally build serious apps that work, instead of getting stuck in frustrating error loops and then abandoning their projects.

We also built a highly scalable hosting system directly on AWS so Floot apps can handle real traffic and business demands. This means non-coders can build, deploy, and scale their apps on a single platform seamlessly.

Plus, Floot is really fun to use! Try building an app at floot.com
one_liner: The easiest way for non-coders to build apps with AI.

name: Palace
long_description:
Palace (palace.so) plans, coordinates, and executes daily back-office work for trucking fleets. By automating the manual decisions that consume planning, dispatch, and CSR teams (assigning loads, managing appointments, communicating updates, and resolving exceptions) carriers can increase revenue-per-driver while running leaner teams.

Leeds and Derek have been building together as close friends for over six years. The team have been early PMs/engineers at exited startups and decacorns and worked on the algorithms behind Amazon’s robotic logistics systems.
one_liner: Palace plans, coordinates, and executes daily ops for trucking fleets

name: Humoniq
long_description:
Humoniq is building the first AI-Native BPO for the travel & transport industries, which outsource $20B of customer support each year. Our AI-native approach improves speed, accuracy, and satisfaction.

Our team is uniquely equipped to solve this challenge. We previously grew a travel management company, Flightfox (YC S12), to $22M/yr. We handled thousands of customer requests each month, which exposed the limitations of traditional outsourcing.
one_liner: AI-Native BPO for travel & transport

name: Pleom
long_description: Automatic insights on all your company data. Speed up business workflows to visualizations with a 0 learning curve.
one_liner: Agentic Business Intelligence

name: Fernstone
long_description: Fernstone is a a full-stack AI insurance brokerage for complex risk. We are competing directly with the 40,000 commercial insurance brokers in the US that earn $80B in revenue each year. Today, construction and security companies use Fernstone to obtain coverage to close contracts and obtain licenses.
one_liner: Full-stack AI insurance brokerage for businesses.

name: AutoAce
long_description: AutoAce is building the AI native operating system for car dealerships. We start with AI service advisors that answer calls and book appointments, so no call is missed and no revenue is lost. Our mission is to connect service, sales, parts, finance, and insurance into one platform, transforming dealerships from reactive operations into proactive systems that anticipate customer needs.
one_liner: AI-native operating system for car dealerships

name: Pally
long_description:
We spend our lives in messaging apps. Slack. iMessage. WhatsApp. We face a constant stream of information, introductions, and things we need to do.

What if you could bring together every message, from every platform, in a Superhuman-like experience, with AI agents that automatically complete your action items?

That’s exactly what we’re building at Pally; a future where you never need to check another inbox again.
one_liner: Intelligent Unified Inbox + Personal CRM

name: Certus AI
long_description:
Certus AI is replacing the restaurant phone line with Voice AI.

Restaurants lose up to $100,000 per year per location from missed calls, lost orders, and abandoned hold lines. Staff are overwhelmed. IVRs frustrate customers. Call centers are expensive and impersonal.

It’s 2025. Guests don’t leave voicemails or wait on hold. They just move on.

Certus is an AI voice agent built for restaurants. It answers every call, 24/7 — taking orders, processing deliveries, booking reservations, upselling, and handling complaints in English, Spanish, French and more. Certus is built to manage the phone line end to end, from the customer call to the restaurant tech stack, with zero human intervention required. It currently integrates with industry-leading systems like Toast, Square, Clover, UberEats, DoorDash, and more.

We’re building the voice layer of the modern restaurant — the employee they’ll never fire.

We started Certus because we lived the pain. Gurveer (CEO) grew up answering phones in his family’s restaurant and helped operate them, growing from 1 to 11 locations in 7 years. Later, he and Adam (CRO) ran a restaurant growth startup to help others increase revenue, but kept watching clients bleed cash because no one picked up the phone. So we built the solution the industry always wished existed.

Until now, this problem was considered unsolvable. But Voice AI has finally crossed the conversational chasm and 72% of consumers now prefer AI over humans as long as it means faster and better service.

More importantly, the market is begging for this. The North American restaurant industry crossed $1 trillion in 2024, and it's projected to hit $1.5 trillion in 2025. Yet over $100 billion is still lost annually to missed calls, human error, and outdated tech. As the market continues to grow, so do the losses!

Our customers say it best:

- “Certus changed my life overnight.”
- “We were losing the ability to give great in-house service — the phone was killing us.”
-  “70% of my business comes through the phone. That’s mine and my 16 staffs livelihood.”
- “Before Certus, I used to lose 40 - 60 calls a day…. now my printer just stays printing!”
-  “I’ve been in the business 38 years. I’ve been waiting for this since then.”

Certus is here to fix the $120B phone problem — one call at a time.

And in doing so, we’re redefining how the restaurant industry communicates forever, starting with the phone line.
one_liner: Replacing the restaurant phone line with Voice AI

name: Reacher
long_description:
Reacher is an AI-powered platform that automates creator marketing workflows—from discovery and outreach to campaign management and content strategy—making marketing teams 10x more productive. 

We handle the manual tasks so brands can focus on building relationships with creators while centralizing their operations in one platform to manage creators on TikTok Shop, Instagram, and YouTube.
one_liner: We automate creator marketing for the world's largest brands

name: dScribe AI
long_description:
dScribe AI uses autonomous drones and 3D vision to track bulk inventory. We're starting by helping the ag and mining industry track stockpiles of grain and gravel.

Bulk inventory tracking is broken. Companies either rely on guesstimates or pay for expensive manual surveys which are still off by 30 to 50%. Without accurate numbers, it’s hard to plan logistics, like how many truckloads are needed. And it creates accounting issues by misreporting inventory value, hurting financial planning and leading to missed opportunities.

We’ve lived this problem, and we know how to solve it. Warren saw it firsthand as a Product Manager at Milk Moovement, a $20M Series A AgTech startup, working closely with feed suppliers and farm managers. Cole was engineer #3 at Tropic, scaling it from seed to Series B, and later led engineering at an AI startup.

We’ve built an integrated hardware and software platform and have signed one of the largest agricultural company in North America. As industries demand real-time visibility into the physical world, dScribe AI is positioned to become the system of record for inventory that don’t fit in traditional boxes and barcodes.
one_liner: Computer vision for bulk inventory tracking

name: Clodo
long_description:
Clodo is built for Vibe GTM. Find and reach your next customers with just a prompt. 
Execute your outbound ideas at the speed of thought.
one_liner: Vibe GTM. Execute your outbound ideas with just a prompt

name: TectoAI
long_description: We help your company identify roles that can be filled by agentic AI tools, onboard them quickly, monitor their performance and behavior post deployment, ensure they remain compliant, and aligned with regulations. Tecto is building the governance platform for managing the AI stack!
one_liner: A Platform for AI Governance

name: RowFlow
long_description:
RowFlow replaces clunky web forms with natural conversations that run over text, slack, or wherever your users are. Our platform increases your form’s response rates while cutting your internal overhead in half. 

With RowFlow, you can take any existing form and instantly convert it into an AI-powered conversation. New flows launch in minutes and reach respondents over your preferred channel or embedded chat. We guide the exchange, follow up automatically, and return clean structured data without extra work from your team.

Forms power billions of business interactions yearly. Whether it’s forms for client intake, registrations, compliance, feedback, or surveys, they all follow the same painful pattern: low conversion, messy data, and frustrated users. Teams have long tolerated forms only because there's been no scalable alternative for collecting structured information from people - until now. Our goal is for RowFlow to become the new default way for how organizations collect user data in an AI-first world.
one_liner: Replacing forms with AI conversations

name: Interfere
long_description: The greatest product teams use Interfere to spend more time building what’s next instead of maintaining what was.
one_liner: Build software that never breaks

name: NOSO LABS
